t = int(raw_input())
from sys import maxint as inf
for i_ in xrange(t):
    a = map(int, raw_input().split())
    m = (inf, -1)
    z = a[0]
    a = a[1:]
    for i, v in enumerate(a):
        m = m if m[0] <= v else (v, i + 1)
    eleven = int("1" * (m[0] + 1))
    print min(10 ** (z + 1), eleven * m[1])
